messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Evelyn Westbury <evelynw2002@...>

Kelly,I live in Orangeburg,SC-about an hour from Columbia.

Evelyn

-=-=-=-=-=

Imagine that! My huband's from O'burg! Ben Lovejoy. Did you or your
husband grow up there?

You might want to join our local group:
SchoolsOutSupport@yahoogroups.com

We try to have *something* going on every now and then. The kids are
clamoring for a CiCi's pizza day and the park afterwards, and the
weather has certainly been cooperative lately!

We also have a pool party here as soon as it warms up a bit (but the
kids have been in the almost daily since March---little popcicles!).

I have a nine year old son (into Yu-Gi-Oh! and gaming and swimming and
bouncing on the trampoline) and a 17 year old son (who is into
music---drumming--and films & film-making).

You're practically my neighbor; we live on the SE side of town, so if
you're ever in Columbia,....


Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org




-








Yahoo! Groups Links
